content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister (DMP) and Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Friday termed the successful launch of Pakistanas indigenous electro-optical (EO-1) satellite a significant achievement in Pakistanas space journey. The DPM took to X for stating a heartfelt felicitation message for the Pakistan Space and Upper Atmosphere Research Commission (SUPARCO) for achieving the milestone. Senator Ishaq Dar said that this achievement was poised to enhance the countryas ability to monitor natural resources, predict and respond to natural disasters, support food security through precision cropping, and drive economic growth through informed decision making. aI congratulate Pakistan Space and Upper Atmosphere Research Commission (SUPARCO) on launching Pakistanas indigenous electro-optical satellite today. Launch of indigenously manufactured EO Satellite is a testament to SUPARCOas expertise and Government of Pakistan commitment to pursue space technology for peaceful purposes,a he said.
